taskName1: You are given 16 letters and you need to make as many words as you can. You can use each letter only once. The words can be from 3 to 10 letters long. Check the spelling while forming the words. The longer the word is, the more points you get. You can not make up personal names, abbreviations or words that are written with a hyphen. If you can not find any new words, you can refresh the playing field and continue the game
